name: Literal Animal Planet
description:
Made in ~3 hours for Trijam 136 with the theme of Animal Planet. I pondered on it for about half an hour and then the idea of a Katamari-esque game where you're making a planet out of literal animals hit me and, well, the rest is history! I had previously made a Katamari-like game for a 3 day game jam, and so the challenge for me here was trying to do it in 3 hours now instead of days.

Controls & Gameplay
  • Movement: WASD
  • Roll your soon-to-be animal planet around to pick-up the cows, sheep, chickens, pigs, and ducks
  • Try and collect as many animals within the 1 minute time limit and go for the highest possible score
  • Witness the beauty of your creation
Assets Used
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/farm-animals-set-97945
  • Various sound effect and music packs
